pages.privacy-policy: CleanEase - Privacy Policy: Your Data Protection CleanEase cleanease@gmail.com HOME ABOUT US Services Contact Privacy Policy CleanEase is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect from users, how we use that information, and how we protect it. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from users: Personal information that users voluntarily provide, such as name, email address, and contact information (optional). Usage data collected automatically, such as browsing history and IP address. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for the following purposes: To provide and improve the CleanEase website and services. To send users information about CleanEase products and services (with consent). To personalize the user experience. To analyze website usage. Data Sharing and Disclosure CleanEase will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases: To comply with legal or regulatory requirements. To protect the rights and safety of CleanEase and its users. To service providers who assist CleanEase in operating the website (these providers will be bound by contractual obligations to keep your information confidential). Data Security CleanEase takes reasonable steps to protect user information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website can guarantee complete security. Your Choices You have choices regarding your information: You can choose not to provide certain information. You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from CleanEase. You can access and update your personal information. The CleanEase website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
